rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
When Playful Chiaykyaich dies, if it wasn't blocking, it deals 2 damage to target player.
[i]Augmented –[/i] At the beginning of each end step, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, return Playful Chiaykyaich from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
